description:
The MEC legacy of durable kids' rainwear continues. These rain pants aren't as light and supple as a previous version (made of 70-denier nylon), but for kids who see any object as possible playground equipment, the heavier oxford nylon is built to be waterproof and stand up to rolling, sliding and scaling.

  • Made of durable oxford 200-denier nylon with polyurethane coating and a highly effective DWR (durable water repellent) finish, for full-on waterproof protection
  • Fully taped seams for complete waterproof protection
  • Elasticised pull-on waist for a comfortable fit over layers
  • Elasticised lower leg openings seal out drafts and water
name: MEC Heritage Rain Pants - Infants
